p1move

boolean p1move(int amount)
p1move : amount (int) -> boolean Given the amount to move, return whether it is a valid move and adjust the pile and p1 accordingly. EvenOdd e = new EvenOdd(); e.p1move(3) -> true e.pile -> 12 e.p1 -> 3 e.p2 -> 0 e.p1move(5) -> false e.pile -> 12 e.p1 -> 3 e.p2 -> 0
